article_title: The Slow Decline In Involuntary Part-Time Work

article_metadata.description: In the latest jobs report, the official unemployment rate, termed the U-3 rate, was 5.4 percent and the number of unemployed persons stood at 8.5 million. However, the broader U-6 rate, which captures all workers who are unemployed, discouraged, or employed only part-time for lack of a full-time job was [...]
article_metadata.author: Aparna Mathur
